thread.title: Germaine de Randamie vs. Holly Holm UFC 208 scorecard
thread.title_full: Germaine de Randamie vs. Holly Holm UFC 208 scorecard

author: Bryan Tucker
title: Germaine de Randamie vs. Holly Holm UFC 208 scorecard
text:
share NYSAC 
The Germaine de Randamie vs. Holly Holm UFC 208 scorecard reveals how the judges scored the main event showdown Saturday night at the Barclays Center in Brooklyn.Judge Chris Lee gave de Randamie rounds one, three and four, while judges Sal D'Amato and Jeff Rullen gave de Randamie rounds one through three. de Randamie was awarded the UFC featherweight belt via unanimous decision (48-47 x3).How did you score the fight?
